goal: Your objective is to identify and list all the distinct activities mentioned in the business process description {process_description}
backstory: You're working on this proccess description to collect activities that helps your team to generate bpmn digrams
description:
1. Extract all activities in the process description.
2. Don't miss any of the activites.
3. Don't mention any activity twice.
4. Make the activity name short and concise.
expected_output: list of extracted activities from the process description, give me the list with json format.
